Description.Text: Royal Decameron Mompiche is a modern 4-star hotel offering spacious accommodation on Mompiche beach, southwest of Esmeraldas. Highlights include five outdoor swimming pools, entertainment centre and a choice of restaurants. Mompiche is a fishing village turned serene beach retreat. It sits on the northwest coast of Ecuador flanked by beautiful beaches and lush green rainforest. Nearby places of interest include Portete Island and Playa Negra beach with its alluring black sand. The hotel is housed in a collection of modern mid-rise buildings. Facilities include five outdoor swimming pools, a gym, theatre, tennis, football and volleyball courts, entertainment centre and a children's playground. Non-motorised water sports and evening entertainment is provided daily. Massages are available on request. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a simple style. They feature a sitting area and a terrace or balcony. Most rooms have a city view. Amenities include a satellite/cable TV, safe and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Alcantilado serves delicious seafood, while Il forno offers Italian cuisine. Miso boasts Thai and sushi dishes and Portete serves international buffet food. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the seven hotel bars which include the Piqueros pool bar and the Los Cocos beach club bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
